summary: Adds a small dungeon to Whiterun. You can call it a bad dream dungeon with a little Jump n Run
descriptionHtml:
One day with the CK. I think there are some good ideas in it so worth playing. Some jump and run things as well.

The key in the first room is for this purpose easy to find...

maybe someone will find the 3 secret chests ( jump n run is needed )

Location near the Skyforge ( near the city wall -> see pic )

Would be nice if the woman in the fire would scream when you enter the room and as soon as you are in her range she will disappears. Maybe coming soon. 

Besides it\'s pretty dark to keep an fearfull atmosphere

Have fun :)


My first mod so please do not blame me for fail lightning e.g :/

A proper location will come soon as well as lighning fix and content adding. 

!!!! Not finished yet  but some ideas in it !!!! \"Alpha status\"
author: killerpixel
